languages.text: "Ненавижу снег. Ни шагу нельзя ступить без магносканера — никогда не знаешь, где лежит мина, готовая оторвать тебе ноги".
"I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."
languages.original_text: "Ненавижу снег. Ни шагу нельзя ступить без магносканера — никогда не знаешь, где лежит мина, готовая оторвать тебе ноги".

traits.locale_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."
"I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."
"I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."
"I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."
"I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

languages.text: 「雪は大嫌いだ。マグノスキャナーなしでは一歩も歩けない。足を吹き飛ばすためセットされた地雷がどこにあるかわからない」
languages.original_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

traits.locale_text: 「雪は大嫌いだ。マグノスキャナーなしでは一歩も歩けない。足を吹き飛ばすためセットされた地雷がどこにあるかわからない」

languages.text: "Ich hasse Schnee. Ohne Magno-Scanner kann man keinen einzigen Schritt gehen – überall könnte eine Mine hochgehen und einem die Beine wegreißen."
languages.original_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hasse Schnee. Ohne Magno-Scanner kann man keinen einzigen Schritt gehen – überall könnte eine Mine hochgehen und einem die Beine wegreißen."

languages.text: "Kardan tiksinirim. Magno tarayıcı olmadan adımını atamazsın. Bacaklarını koparacak bir mayının nerede saklandığını kestirmek imkânsızdır."
languages.original_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

traits.locale_text: "Kardan tiksinirim. Magno tarayıcı olmadan adımını atamazsın. Bacaklarını koparacak bir mayının nerede saklandığını kestirmek imkânsızdır."

languages.text: «Odio la nieve. Hace falta un escáner magnético para atravesarla; nunca se sabe cuándo hay una mina esperando para dejarle a uno sin piernas».
languages.original_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

traits.locale_text: «Odio la nieve. Hace falta un escáner magnético para atravesarla; nunca se sabe cuándo hay una mina esperando para dejarle a uno sin piernas».

languages.text: “我痛恨雪。若是没有磁场扫描仪，简直是寸步难行。你永远不知道哪里埋着地雷，随时会把你的腿炸飞。”
languages.original_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

traits.locale_text: “我痛恨雪。若是没有磁场扫描仪，简直是寸步难行。你永远不知道哪里埋着地雷，随时会把你的腿炸飞。”

languages.text: « Je déteste la neige. On ne peut pas avancer d'un pas sans s'armer d'un magno-scanner, car impossible de savoir si on risque de poser le pied sur une mine qui nous rendra culs-de-jatte. »
languages.original_text: "I despise the snow. You can't take a step without a magno-scanner — you never know where there's a mine ready to rip your legs off."

traits.locale_text: « Je déteste la neige. On ne peut pas avancer d'un pas sans s'armer d'un magno-scanner, car impossible de savoir si on risque de poser le pied sur une mine qui nous rendra culs-de-jatte. »
